title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working, such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
OB: When I launch the Help view on March 26, 2002, on Win2K, the tab key does not function as expected.
EB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key should be able to navigate through the live areas without the need for a preliminary click.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view on Win2K.
2. Observe that the tab key does not navigate through the live areas.
3. Click on one of the live areas, such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
4. Observe that after clicking, the tab key starts working correctly.
